sense.def:
The shell of an egg or nut
je trd zunanji ovoj, ki obdaja jajce ali orešek.

A shell
je trdo varovalno ogrodje, ki ga želve, polži in raki nosijo na hrbtu.

A shell
je tudi trdo ogrodje, ki obdaja majhne mehke morske živali; ista beseda se uporablja tudi za samo ogrodje brez živali.

seg.quote: ...a handkerchief full of shells which my sister had collected.

sense.def:
To shell peas or nuts
pomeni odstraniti zunanji varovalni del stročnice ali oreška.

A shell
je tudi ogrodje stavbe.

seg.quote: ...the burned-out shell that had once been their home.

sense.def:
A shell
je tudi kovinsko ohišje, napolnjeno z razstrelivom, ki ga izstrelijo iz topa.

seg.quote: Arnold had his leg smashed when a shell hit the truck he was driving.

sense.def:
To shell a place
pomeni streljati na neki kraj z granatami.

seg.quote: They continued to shell towns on the northern coast.
